mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
mapper.update: update member set point=point+500 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select mmm.*, fff.nickname from member mmm, (select mm.name, ff.nickname from member mm, (select m.*, f.friend, f.nickname from member m, friends f where f.id=#{id} and f.id=m.id) ff where mm.id=ff.friend) fff where mmm.name=fff.name
select * from emailAuth where id=#{id} and uuid=#{key}
